title: Ticket #6309: condor_q -grid should select format based on each ad's grid resource
description:
Rather than having to add a -grid:_type_ subflag for each type, condor_q -grid should group the ads by grid resource type and display a separate and properly-formatted table for each one. Only the grouping aspect of this should be hard -- condor_q doesn't do that right now.

The grouping aspect may first show up in the idea that the USER column should be the default group attribute (argument to GROUP BY), and the first group attribute (maybe only as a special case for USER) should be printed above each group, and the redundant attribute omitted from the columns.
